org.jtrim.swing.access

Enum InvisiblePanelFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<InvisiblePanelFactory>
      • org.jtrim.swing.access.InvisiblePanelFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<InvisiblePanelFactory>, DecoratorPanelFactory

    public enum InvisiblePanelFactory
extends java.lang.Enum<InvisiblePanelFactory>
implements DecoratorPanelFactory
    A DecoratorPanelFactory implementation creating invisible JPanel instances blocking all user inputs if install as a glass pane of a Swing component.

    Note that this class is a singleton and its one and only instance can be accessed by INSTANCE.

    Thread safety

    Methods of this class are safe to be accessed from multiple threads concurrently.

    Synchronization transparency

    The createPanel method of this class is not synchronization transparent.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      INSTANCE
      The one and only instance of InvisiblePanelFactory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.swing.JPanel createPanel(java.awt.Component decorated)
      Creates and returns a JPanel which has a completely transparent background and will block all user input from a component if installed as its glass pane.

      • createPanel

        public javax.swing.JPanel createPanel(java.awt.Component decorated)
        Creates and returns a JPanel which has a completely transparent background and will block all user input from a component if installed as its glass pane.
        Specified by:
        createPanel in interface DecoratorPanelFactory
        Parameters:
        decorated - this argument is ignored by this method
        Returns:
        a new JPanel which has a completely transparent background and will block all user input from a component if installed as its glass pane. This method never returns null.
